title: Bugsplat and windows 10 update
body: Is anyone else having issues after the windows 10 anniversary update and getting a bugsplat?  It seems everyday now the first game I try and join I get a bugsplat.  I then have to logout and log back in which usually forces me to reapply patch before i can join the game. Then it will work fine.  Not sure what the issue is but I have run repair and tried other things and not helping.  Don't really want to have to reinstall everything from scratch to try and fix this.  Not sure if there is a known issue someone else has found to maybe help me out.

replies.body: I tried closing the dvr recordings in the xbox app and it still doesn't work. I notice that every time the bug splat appears, window sends me a message telling me that the system have blocked lol from entering something. I also tried redownload, update drive, and a bunch of other stuff, but my issue seems different from yours. my game always crashes when im already in the game in the fountain. anybody know whats happening to mine?
That would be my mistake looking only for the reference of bug splat and not the general term crashes.

The Anniversary pushed out some changes to the Windows Game Bar, one of which, enabled *Game DVR*, which has been causing crashes and bugsplats. I definitely recommend [disabling this feature](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if it resolves the issue for you.

Let me know if this helped.
